dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: Not much. I just finished a project at work.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: Oh, that sounds busy! How did it go?

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: It was challenging but manageable. I'm glad it's over.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: I hope you got a chance to relax too. Let me know if you need any help.
